title: Welcome Message
content: Welcome to your feedback dashboard! This is where you can read anonymous messages sent by your followers.

title: Feature Request
content: It would be great if we could attach images to the feedback forms. Any plans for that in the future?

title: Kind Words
content: Just wanted to say that your recent project was super inspiring. Keep up the amazing work!

title: Anonymous Tip
content: Check out the new API documentation for better performance on aggregation queries. It saved me hours.

title: Question
content: How long did it take you to learn Next.js and Tailwind CSS? Everything looks so polished.
